title: Chapter 385 - Mowing Down Foes Like Mustard Grass

Chapter 385 - Mowing Down Foes Like Mustard Grass

The Blood Sacrifice Spirit Array was an ancient, grand formation placed here by the third-generation leader of the Immortals Sword House, Bai Changhen.

If it absorbed the blood essence of a True Spirit divine beast, its power was sufficient to slay all foes beneath the Imperial Realm!

Now, the formation’s power was under Chu Xiu’s control. Although its power had yet to reach its upper limit, it was still so terrifying that Tong Xinghai, Clarifying Truth, and the others despaired.

Yet now, Su Yi had taken down a manifestation of the formation’s power in a single slash!

This was unquestionably unbelievable!

Before the crowd could react—

Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh!

As Su Yi waved his sword, streak after streak of sword qi manifested from the inscrutable power of the restriction shot forth and descended.

The seventeen charging monstrosities burst apart like giant soap bubbles and scattered into flecks of light.

Rumble!

The dispersed power of the formation fell like rain, then swept outward like a windstorm.

“This….”

“How terrifying!”

Tong Xinghai, Clarifying Truth, and the others were all visibly stunned.
